SEARCH
Package org.Model.Phases

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
org.Model.Phases.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
IssueOrderPhase, OrderExecutionPhase, StartUpPhase
public abstract class Phase extends Object
Handles the state of the Game, using various phases. This class represents the parent class of all the phases present in the game. This class model follows STATE PATTERN for the game.

    • performEditContinent

      protected abstract void performEditContinent(Command l_cmd, Player p_player) throws MapInvalidException, InvalidCommand
      Used for performing the edit continent operation for the game , only applicable for START EXECUTION PHASE
      Parameters:
      l_cmd - : Command provided by user
      p_player - : null for START EXECUTION PHASE
      Throws:
      MapInvalidException - : If there is some issues with the map
      InvalidCommand - : If there is some issues with the command
